column8: ʿAbbād ibn ʿAbbās, unidentified physician, addressee of Ibn Mandawayh al-Iṣfahānī

column2: ʿAbd Allāh ibn Nāʾilī (`or` Ibn al-Tātalī `or` Ibn al-Bābilī)
column8: ʿAbd Allāh ibn Nāʾilī (`or` Ibn al-Tātalī `or` Ibn al-Bābilī), specialist in alchemy and numerology, member of the Almoravid dynasty
